name: Stella Vermillion (Chivalry of a Failed Knight)
description:
Stella Vermillion from Chivalry of a Failed Knight (Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry). Trained on 61 SFW and NSFW images.

NOTE: A weight of 0.8-1.0 seems to be the sweet spot when generating.

v1.0 is better at producing anime-style generations while v2.0 is more flexible with different styles and can do detailed backgrounds a lot better.

Use stella vermillion to generate Stella. For her full outfit, use:

  • school uniform

  • garter straps, black thighhighs

  • cross-laced footwear

Only use the tags that you want visible in the generation. i.e. don't add the cross-laced footwear prompt if you're generating an upper body shot. Does other outfits/NSFW well.

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
• updated the training data

    • added 20 new images

    • removed 5 low quality images

  • split the uniform prompt to give more flexibility

  • trained on a lower DIM so the background doesn't get cannibalized

modelVersions.name: v1.0 (outdated)
modelVersions.description: This version is better at producing the anime style, but can pretty much only do the anime style. Backgrounds are also not great. Still useable though if you don't mind the trade-off.
